data.text:
American actress, producer and singer Drew Sidora made her screen debut in the television movie Divas in 1995. She has received praise for her performances in Step Up, Wild Hogs, White Chicks and Never Die Alone.

What is Drew Sidora’s net worth? Salary, Earnings

Hollywood actress Sidora primarily earns her living from her acting career. As of 2024, Celebrity Net Worth estimates the Step Up actress’ net worth to be $1.5 million.

His wealth has also been helped by the positive reviews of his films. One of her best-selling films, Never Die Alone, grossed $5,923,000 at the box office.

She played the role of Haley Davis in the motorcycle comedy “Wild Hogs.” With a budget of $60 million, the film grossed $253.6 million at the worldwide box office.

Where was Drew Sidora born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

Drew Sidora’s full name is Drew Sidora Pittman. On May 1, 1985, in Chicago, Illinois, he was born under the sign of Taurus in the United States. She is an American citizen and a member of the white ethnic group. She has not revealed her family members. In terms of schooling, Sidora went to Rich Central High School.

Is Drew Sidora married? Relationship

Drew Sidora’s relationship status as an actress indicates that she is married to Ralph Pittman. She exchanged vows with her spouse on August 21, 2014.

Together, the couple has two children. They welcomed their baby Machai David Pittman into the world on June 30, 2015, at 3:38 am. Her first child was born seven weeks early, after three weeks of hospitalization.

It weighed four pounds. She was 16.5 inches long and weighed 4.5 ounces at birth. The couple completed their family on February 14, 2018, when their daughter Aniya Grace Pittman was born.

How did Drew Sidora start his Professional Career?

At the age of two, Drew began taking music and acting lessons. At nine years old he starred in the Fox TV movie Divas with Nicole Ari Parker, Lisa Nicole Carson and Khalil Kain.

The 36-year-old then starred in the 2004 release of Ernest R. Dickerson’s crime thriller Never Die Alone. He later rose to fame for his recurring role as Chantel in the renowned supernatural teen drama “That’s So Raven” on Disney Channel.

Sidora is known for her roles in movies like CrazySexyCool: The TLC Story and Step Up. Apart from that, she started her singing career in 2006. She sang two songs, “For The Love” and “Til The Dawn”, in Set Up in 2006.

Additionally, he has sung on other songs, such as “Three Can Play” and “Give It Up Two Me.” In 2022, she will play the lead role in the film Line Sisters.

The Wild Hogs actress was dating her ex-boyfriend before Pittman. Her son Josiah was also born on March 21, 2011. Unfortunately, the couple separated for an unnamed reason.
